Está agradecida y contenta al saber que seguirá contando con el apoyo financiero para avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas responsables.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de repuestos de motos como llantas y otros para dar mantenimiento a su vehículo, buscando precios cómodos por sus compras, así su vehículo seguirá operativa y obtendrá mayores ganancias.
texts.en: Cely is a hard-working and determined 32-year-old woman who wants to get ahead in life. She is married to Jairo who works as a security guard and is father of her three children. They live in their own home and love their children dearly. Cely rents passenger transportation in the city, and has a public transportation vehicle that she bought with the help of her husband. She rents the vehicle to a responsible person who pays her per day worked. She started this business more than 3 years ago, buying the vehicle with the couple's joint savings. Her husband sometimes drives the vehicle in his free time. She believes it to be a profitable business because of the money it earns and the demand for her service. She therefore wants to continue with it and increase the number of vehicles she has. This will be her third loan with the MFP institution. She is grateful and happy to know that she can continue to count on financial support to move her business forward. She says she is also content with her communal bank because she knows the members and considers them to be responsible people. With the requested amount of 2000 nuevos soles, she will invest in purchasing motorcycle spare parts such as tires and other parts to give maintenance to her vehicle, looking for the best prices in what she buys. This will mean that her vehicle will continue working and will create more profits.

loans.use: to buy tires and give maintenance to her vehicle.

loans.name: Yasser

texts.en:
Yasser is a 42-year-old divorced man. He has owned a grocery store since 1998, which is his only source of income. Yasser is a Palestinian refugee, but unlike most of the Palestinians living in Lebanon, Yasser opened his business outside the refugee camp.

Yasser is a hard worker who is courageous enough to take the chance of opening his own business, and to improve and organize it in a well-managed way.

Yasser applied for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua to buy special winter hot drinks and cereals with special offers. 

Yasser is well-known with his good reputation, special prices and customer care. He hopes to keep on increasing his business capital, replying to his customers' needs and expanding his working area.

loans.use: To buy special winter hot drinks and cereals with special offers.

loans.name: Raed

texts.en: Raed is a fourth-year student at one of the Jordanian universities. He is majoring in agriculture engineering. Raed is also the oldest brother for six siblings. Now he wants to enroll in the last semester so he can graduate after that; for that, he has applied for this loan in order to pay the semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Zohrab

texts.en:
Zohrab is a 27-year-old newly married man. He is a home craftsman and has 10 years’ experience in this sphere. Over the past years, he has quite expanded his engagement and doesn't plan to stop these achievements. 

Zohrab makes doors, windows, lattice, plasters, etc. His work has a good demand and is the only source of income to the family.

Zohrab is requesting a loan to cover the cost of purchasing necessary materials and equipment to continue his job.

loans.use: To purchase necessary materials and equipment to continue working.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 50 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de salir adelante, además es amable y sociable sabiendo ganarse el aprecio de las personas con su carisma. Está casada con Israel quien se dedica al transporte y padre de sus 3 hijos. Juntos habitan cómodamente en su propia casa que construyeron con sus esfuerzos.
La actividad que realiza María es la costura, oficio que aprendió estudiando en un centro de educación ocupacional de joven. Iniciándose con una máquina, brindando trabajos bien realizados a sus clientes que salen satisfechos y la recomiendan con otras personas. También vende pescados por las mañanas en el mercadillo de su barrio.
La costura las realiza desde su casa, a donde llegan sus clientes y los atiende amablemente. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda que tiene sus costuras, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando sola, pero en ocasiones le apoya su hija en sus ratos libres. Se decidió a empezar con su actividad  contando con un préstamo ya que necesitaba de un oficio para generase sus ingresos económicos, además de la solicitud de sus vecinas al ver sus buenos acabados en la costura. 
Pero ya por edad le resulta algo cansado estar en una misma postura para coser, por eso con las ganancias desea invertir en una bodega de abarrotes. Este será el préstamo número 19 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado, comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas buenas y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales de costura como telas, hilos, elásticos y otros, todos estos materiales piensa traer desde la capital buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras en volumen. Además de ropa para la venta. Y con el saldo usarlo capital de trabajo en el pescado.
texts.en: María is a hardworking 50-year-old woman with a strong desire to make headway. She is friendly and sociable, and knows how to get on people's good side with her charisma. She is married to Israel, who makes a living in transportation and is the father of their three children. They all live comfortably in their own home that they built with a lot of hard work. María makes a living as a seamstress, a trade she learned at a vocational center when she was young. She started with a sewing machine doing work for her customers, who left satisfied and recommended her to others. She also sells fish in the mornings at her neighborhood market. She does her sewing work from her home, where customers come as she tends to them amicably. She considers her business to be quite lucrative because of the profits she makes and the demand for her handiwork. Up to the moment, she works on her own, but on occasion her daughter helps out in her free time. She decided to start her business by taking out a loan because she needed a trade to generate her own income, in addition to the pleas of her neighbors who wanted to have a good seamstress nearby. But because of her age she gets somewhat tired from being in the same sewing position, so with her profits she wants to invest in a little grocery store. This will be her 19th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and she hopes with this loan she will be able to fulfill her objectives. She says that she enjoys working with her community bank because she knows her fellow members and considers them to be good and supportive people. With the loan, she plans to purchase sewing supplies like fabrics, threads, elastics and other items. All of these materials she plans to bring in from the capital to get better prices buying in bulk. She will also buy clothes to sell, and the remaining sum she will use for her fish business.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, threads, elastics and other items.

loans.name: Zulma Edith

texts.es:
Zulma es una mujer de 22 años, es soltera, vive en la ciudad de Chincha, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo de superación; gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de su familia, Zulma pudo estudiar la carrera técnica de Cosmetología, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Zulma trabaja en su pequeño negocio de peluquería, donde brinda servicios de corte, pintado, manicure, pedicura y otros, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable y ambiente cómodo que brinda a sus clientes.
Zulma se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de trabajo, tales como tintes, sticker de uñas, limas, jabones exfoliantes, entre otros; de esta manera Zulma contará con los materiales necesarios para realizar su labor, de esta manera ella espera seguir trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ser una microempresaria y tener su spa, donde brinde servicios completos de belleza.
texts.en:
Zulma is a 22-year-old single woman who lives in the city of Chincha. She is a kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person who has a strong desire to get ahead in life. Thanks to the efforts and support of her family, Zulma was able to study cosmetology. In her free time, she likes to watch TV, and sometimes cooks a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa seca [a traditional Peruvian dish from Chincha] to share with her family. 

Owing to her own initiative and a lot of hard work and dedication, Zulma works every day in her small hairdressing salon, where she offers haircuts, hair-dying, manicures, pedicures etc. She starts work early in the mornings and can work around 10 hours a day. She enjoys her work and thinks that she is successful because of the way she treats her customers and the comfortable ambiance she has created in her business. 

Zulma is very grateful to the Kiva lenders as they will help her to be able to buy supplies for work such as dyes, nail stickers, and exfoliating soaps among other items. In this way, Zulma will have the necessary materials to do her job. She hopes to keep working and striving to achieve her great dream of becoming a businesswoman and having her own spa from which she will be able to offer a complete beauty service.

loans.use: to buy dyes, nail stickers, and exfoliating soaps among other items for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Huthaifa

texts.en: Huthaifa is a 21-year-old single guy who is looking after his younger five sisters. He is a law student at one of the Jordanian universities. He has applied for this loan to pay for his upcoming semester fees in hopes that he can graduate as soon as possible and start practicing law.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Chikophe

texts.en:
The desire to improve is one of this man’s most important dreams. He lives with his family in a house he owns in the town of Likoni.
 
Chikophe works selling household items like utensils, among others. He sells from place to place and has many customers that prefer his items for their quality, affordable prices and above all for his quick service. He’s an active, enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and who has many goals he wants to reach. He’s working hard to attain a more prosperous future for his family. He feels very happy with his business but knows that he has to make it grow if he’s to rise out of poverty.

Chikophe is asking for this loan to purchase merchandise like plates, mugs, jewelry, etc.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise like plates, mugs, jewelry, etc

loans.name: Alnaji

texts.en: Alnaji is a 20-year-old single guy who lives with his family of seven members. Alnaji is a university student studying to become a teacher. He believes that building our future comes from educating the new generation. He has applied for this loan so he can pay for the next semester's fees.

loans.use: to pay for the next semester's fees.

loans.name: Ameeneh

texts.en: Ameeneh, a 47-year-old conservative woman, has asked her husband to take her place in the photo. While she is taking care of her 8 sons and daughters, her husband collects scrap items and sells them for recycling. He also collects old bread and sell it to cattle and sheep owners.  Ameeneh wanted to help her husband to buy a small truck or van to make the collecting process easier on him, for this reason she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to buy a small truck or van

loans.name: Luchando Todas Juntas Group

texts.es:
Este grupo de la ciudad de Encarnación surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la Fundación,  el grupo se encuentra en el 19º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2011, y han aprendido mucho en todo este tiempo que llevan juntas.
Una de ellas es la Sra. María ella tiene 1 hijo,  está casada  con el Sr. Rodolfo y ella se dedica hace varios años como modista. Comenta que ella y su marido se esfuerzan por salir adelante, se ayudan mutuamente y desean poder ir creciendo para dar a su hijo una vida digna.
Ella solicita de este crédito para la compra de telas e hilos, y así poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes. El grupo lleva este nombre ya que todas las miembros luchan juntas por salir adelante y de esa forma ser las mejores en lo que hacen.
texts.en: This group, from the city of Encarnación, came about when one of the members contacted the Foundation. The group is on its 19th loan, and has been working with the Foundation since 2011. They have learned a lot during the time that they have been together. One of the members is Maria who has a son and is married to Rodolfo. She has worked as a dress maker for many years. She says that her and her husband try very hard to get ahead; they help each other and hope to be able to keep moving forward to give their son a decent life. She is requesting this loan to buy fabric and thread to continue working and completing her clients' orders. The group was given its name Luchando Todas Juntas (Women Striving Together) because all of the members strive together to get ahead and be the best at what they do.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
Elena es una mujer de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su  esposo y sus tres pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Elena trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de golosinas, ella cuenta con un pequeño espacio en su vivienda, el cual utiliza para realizar sus ventas, Elena trabaja desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, adicionalmente también cría cuyes, patos y pavos para su venta, Elena se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Elena se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una refrigeradora, la cual le servirá de mucho para poder conservar gaseosas, refrescos, helados, gelatinas y otros alimentos, ya que en la época de verano complementará su negocio con dichas ventas, así también desea comprar una vitrina y mas golosinas para abastecer su negocio, de esta manera Elena espera poder aumentar sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos económicos, los cuales le servirán de mucho para que poco a poco pueda lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y ver a sus hijo convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Elena is a woman of 20. She lives in the city of Cañete, in the Imperial district with her husband and her three small children,  whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly, hard-working and enthusiastic person. She and her husband dedicate all their efforts to raising their family.

With a great deal of effort and dedication, Elena works every day in her small business selling candy. She has a small space In her home which she uses to carry on her sales. Elena  works from an early hour of the morning, and is able to do so for approximately 10 hours. In addition, she raises guinea pigs, ducks and turkeys to sell. 

Elena feels happy doing her work, and believes it is going well because of the good service that she provides her customers. Elena is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the help offered, she will be able to purchase a refrigerator which will be very useful for keeping soft drinks, fruit drinks, ice cream, gelatins and other food, as in the summertime she will supplement her business with these sales. 

In addition, she wishes to buy a display case, as well as more candy for stocking her business. In this way, Elena hopes to be able to increase her sales and her income. This will help her a great deal, so that little by little she can achieve her great dream of having her own house, and seeing her children become fine professionals.

loans.use: To purchase a refrigerator, a display case and candy.

loans.name: Esperance

texts.en: Esperance is 26 years old. She recently changed her business from selling meats to selling foodstuffs. She would like a loan to buy more beans and sorghum. The profits will be used to buy another plot of land to use as farmland.

loans.use: To buy more foodstuffs for sale such as beans and sorghum.

loans.name: Basnewende Group

texts.fr:
Mme CHANTAL représente le groupe BASNEWENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 09ans et le moins âgé a 09mois. Un (01)  va à l’école et elle a trois (03) personnes en charge.

Mme vend de la patte d’arachide depuis 2004 soit 09ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 22. Ses clients sont les femmes.

Elle veut s’acheter 25 plats d’arachides.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle veut mieux s’occuper de sa famille. Mme ambitionne agrandir son commerce et s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Mme Chantal represents the BASNEWENDE group. Married, she is the mother of three children. The eldest is nine and the youngest nine months. One goes to school and she has three people in her care. 

Mme Chantal has sold ground nut paste since 2004, thus for nine years. She stocks up in the market of the 22nd sector. Her customers are women.

She wants to buy 25 dishes of groundnuts. 

With her profits, she wants to better take care of her family. She aspires to grow her business and buy herself a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy 25 plates of groundnuts

loans.name: L'aenir Group

texts.fr:
Mme AISSATOU représente le groupe L’AENIR. Elle se porte bien ainsi que tout le groupe. Mariée, elle est mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 05mois. Tous  vont à l’école et elle a une (01) personne en charge.
Mme vend des produits de beauté, des objets plastiques et fait aussi la coiffure depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés locaux. Ses clients sont les femmes, hommes et son entourage.
Elle veut s’acheter  04 douzaines de tissage, 40 seaux, 20 bassine et 03 carton de pommades toutes sortes.

Elle veut épargner ses bénéfices. Mme ambitionne améliorer son activité, aider son mari à assurer la scolarité de ses enfants  et s’acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Mme Aissatou represents the AENIR group. She is doing well, along with the rest of the group. Married, she is the mother of three children. The oldest is twelve years old and the youngest is five. All attend school and she has one other person in her care.

Mme Aissatou has sold beauty products and plastic objects and also worked as a hair stylist for ten years. She stocks up in the local markets. Her customers are women, men, and her circle of friends.

She would like to buy four dozen hair weaves, 40 pails, 30 basins, and three boxes of all sorts of pommade. 

She wants to save her profits. Mme Aissatou aspires to improve her business, help her husband provide for her children's schooling, and buy herself a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy four dozen hair weaves, 40 pails, 30 basins, and three boxes of all sorts of pommade.

loans.name: Aissatou

texts.fr: Madame Aissatou est une femme mariée qui habite au Sénégal. Elle évolue depuis 14 ans dans le secteur de la mécanique. Les moments qu’elle consacre a ses activités sont compris entre 8h et 16h dans la journée. Les revenus que lui procure son activité lui permettent d’assurer la dépense quotidienne et de payer les factures. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’UIMCEC et a déjà remboursé 3 prêts antérieurs. Elle sollicite un crédit de 500 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de matériels industriels dans le but de développer son activité. Avec l’accroissement de ses revenus elle espère améliorer les conditions alimentaires de ses enfants et prendre en charge leurs frais scolaires
texts.en:
Aissatou is a married woman who lives in Senegal. For the past 14 years she has worked in the mechanics sector, and works in her business from 8 am until 4 pm. The income she gets from her business allows her to cover her daily expenses and pay her bills. 

Aissatou is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches, and has already repaid her three prior loans. She has requested a loan of 500,000 francs to buy industrial materials, in order to develop her business. With the increased income, she hopes to be able to provide her children with better food, as well as to take care of their education expenses.

loans.use: To buy industrial materials.

loans.name: Kpayi Group

texts.fr: KPAYI est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres sont des amies s’approvisionnant au même endroit. La représentante du groupe, Sènami Jeanne (dont la main est levée sur la photo), est âgée de 41 ans et est marié à un certain François. Sènami Jeanne est mère de huit enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à la charge du couple. Sènami Jeanne vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges. Sènami Jeanne a peu fréquenté l’école. Il y a près de dix ans que Sènami Jeanne mène comme activité la vente du maïs et des boules d’akassa (aliment local fait à base de l’amidon de manioc). Sènami Jeanne mène cette activité afin de pourvoir aux besoins du ménage. Sènami Jeanne s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle, Sènami Jeanne sollicite un premier crédit avec les autres membres du groupe KPAYI. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
Kpayi is a group of three members, who are all friends and get their supplies in the same place. The group’s representative is called Sènami Jeanne, and is pictured with her hand raised in the photo. She is 41 years of age, and is married to François. She has eight children, some of whom are at school and all under the care of the couple. Sènami Jeanne lives with her children and husband, and the couple makes sure that the various household expenses are met. 

Sènami Jeanne did not go to school for very long, and for almost 10 years has worked selling corn and akassa balls (a local food made using cassava starch). She works in this business so that she can better provide for her household. Sènami Jeanne gets her supplies from a market in Benin, and in order to ensure customer satisfaction, she has asked for her first loan alongside the other members of the Kpayi group. This loan will allow them to better meet their customers’ needs, as well as to generate more profits.

loans.use: To buy bags of corn.

loans.name: Jean Baptiste

texts.en:
Jean Baptiste is 52 years old. He is married to a farmer and they have two children and they both attend school. He wants a Kiva loan for buying fertilizers and covering labor costs. He has been a maize farmer for 30 years. The profits from the business will be for buying a tractor for using in maize production.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy more fertilizers and cover labor during maize production.

loans.name: Fasso Kanou Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des familles nucléaires, les quatre  femmes du groupe Fasso Kanou ont en moyenne 44 ans et 5 enfants. Elles habitent toutes au quartier Bagadadji dans la ville de Ségou et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché de Bagadadji. Elles font l’achat et la vente de céréales, de condiments, du charbon de bois, du bois de chauffe, des jus locaux d’oseille de guinée et de gingembre. Dans le souci d’augmenter leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso  avec qui, elles sont à leur 14ème  cycle de prêt solidaire.
Djènèbou (femme en 2ème position sur la photo de la  droite vers la gauche) est une grande vendeuse de condiments de toutes sortes. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 200kg d’oignon, 2 sacs de sels iodés et un carton de boites de concentrées de tomates. Elle effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes, à domicile, en ambulant  et au marché de Bagadadji. Avec ce prêt,  Djènèbou  espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et prendre en charge certains besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Married mostly in nuclear families, the four women of the Fasso Kanou group, on average, are 44 years old and have five children. They live in the same area of Bagadadji in the town of Segou and know each other from neighborhood ties and their business activities in the Bagadadji market. They engage in the buying and selling of cereals, condiments, charcoal, firewood, and hibiscus and ginger root juices. In order to increase their business capital, the members of the group decided to join Yoro Yiriwaso's loan program. This is their fourteenth group loan. 

Djènèbou (the second woman on the right in the photo) sells all sorts of condiments. She hopes to use her loan to buy 200 kilograms of onions, two sacs of iodized salt and a carton of cans of tomato paste. She makes her sales from her home and in the Bagadadji market, in cash and credit, to customers who are mostly women. 

With this loan, Djènèbou hopes to make an average monthly profit of 50,000 francs CFA, which will be used to reinvest in the business and to support some of her household needs.

loans.use: to buy condiments

loans.name: Mariam

texts.fr:
Mme MARIAM  est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Elle se porte bien. Le plus âgé a 15ans et le moins âgé a 12ans. Deux(02) vont à l’école et elle a trois (03) personnes  en charge.
Mme vend de pagnes et prêt à porté pour enfant depuis 10 ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marcher de 10. Ses clients sont partout en ville car elle ambulante.
Elle veut s’acheter  05 pièces de pagnes et 05 douzaines de prêt a porté.
Elle veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour renforcer son activité et aider son mari pour les dépenses familiales. Mme ambitionne agrandir son activité en ouvrant une boutique pour pagne et assurer  l'avenir des enfants en leur scolarisant.
texts.en:
Mariam is married and a mother of two children, who go to school. The oldest is 15 years old and the youngest is 12 years old. She is doing well. She has three people under her care. 

Mariam has been selling pagne [traditional, colorful fabric] and children's ready-to-wear clothes for 10 years. She buys her goods at the sector 10 market in town. Her customers are from all over town, because she moves around [to sell her goods]. 

She wants to buy five lengths of pagne and five dozen ready-to-wear outfits. She wants to use the profits she makes to increase her business and to help her husband with the household expenses. 

Mariam has the ambition to grow her business and open a pagne shop, and to ensure the schooling and the future of her children.

loans.use: to buy 5 lengths of pagne [traditional, colorful fabric] and 5 dozen ready-to-wear outfits

loans.name: Mnatsakan

texts.ru:
Мнацакан уже несколько раз пользовался кредитами КИВА. В прошлом году он построил теплицу для рассады, сделал там отопление, в результате чего его доход неплохо увеличился. Раньше рассаду приходилось покупать, и она не всегда была хорошего качества. Теперь же он все выращивает сам. Это позволило Мнацакану подкопить средств и сыграть свадьбу дочери в этом году. 
Мнацакан планирует еще вкладывать в развитие своего тепличного хозяйства. В этот раз он обратился к КИВА за кредитом в размере 22 500 гривен с целью построить дополнительную теплицу у себя на свободном участке земли. Это даст возможность увеличить доход и садить больше помидор.
texts.en:
Mnatsakan has been using the loans from Kiva several times. Last year he built a greenhouse for the seedlings where he installed heating which has raised his income. He used to buy the seedlings before which was not always of good quality. Right now he grows everything himself. This allowed Mnatsakan to save some money and hold a wedding celebration for his daughter this year.

Mnatsakan plans to invest more into the growth of his greenhouse business. This time he has come to Kiva for a loan in the amount of 22,500 hryvnia with a goal to build an additional greenhouse on the vacant plot of land. This will allow him to increase income and plant more tomatoes.

loans.use: to build an additional greenhouse on the vacant plot of land.

loans.name: Virgen De Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El grupo virgen de las mercedes está en su segundo ciclo, son 10 mujeres jefas de familia que muy esperanzadas en que el programa de la fundación les ayude, es por ello que se unieron, empiezan a trabajar juntas y quieren llegar muy lejos.
Marcelina, la presidenta, es una persona con gran potencial, por lo que sus amigas la eligieron, es trabajadora y por sobre todo tiene un gran entusiasmo siempre, con lo que motiva a sus compañeras. Ella solicita del crédito para la compra de insumos para su despensa, ya que quiere poder surtirlo con enlatados, gaseosas, panificados, fideos, y demás.
Ella y sus compañeras agradecen por esta gran oportunidad que reciben, pues no solo ellas serán beneficiadas, sino también sus familias.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Virgen de las Mercedes" is in its second loan cycle.  The ten women members are heads of household who are hopeful the foundation's program will help them.  With that in mind, they joined together with the hope of getting very far.

Marcelina, the president, is a person with great potential and was elected by her friends for that reason.  She is a hard worker and always enthusiastic, so she motivates her colleagues.  She is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her grocery store.  She wants to buy canned goods, sodas, bakery products, noodles and other items.

She and her colleagues are grateful for this opportunity, because not only will they benefit from it themselves, but also their families.

loans.use: To buy canned goods, sodas, bakery products, noodles and other items.

loans.name: Arminda

texts.es:
Arminda   es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella vive junto a su familia en la ciudad de Guadalupe, la cual se ubica al norte de la capital de nuestro país, es una ciudad muy calidad y sobre todo se desarrolla mucho la agricultura. Arminda es una mujer muy trabajora, sus padres le enseñaron desde muy joven el valor del trabajo y sobre todo a luchar por lo que desea a pesar de las adversidades, es por ello que poco a poco y con mucho esfuerzo Arminda inicio su negocio de venta de abarrotes desde un año, en el mercado de su ciudad. Día a día Arminda trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al día   y puede atender hasta 25 clientes en el día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque  ofrece productos de calidad.

Arminda está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mas mercadería para su negocio como menestras como habas, alverja, chuno, ají panca al por mayor, frejoles, pallares, entre otros; de esta manera ella podrá tener mayor variedad de productos y seguir luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”  Tener un local propio”.
texts.en:
Arminda is a very hard working woman who lives with her family in the city of Guadalupe, which is located north of the capital of our country.  It is a very warm city where there is much agriculture.  Arminda's parents taught her at a young age the value of hard work and how to struggle to get what she wanted despite adversities.  Therefore, little by little, with much effort Arminda started her grocery business a year ago.  It is located in the city market and every day Arminda workes nine hours attending to up to 25 customers a day.  She believes business is going so well because she is kind to the customers and offers them quality products.

Arminda is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to them she can buy more merchandise for her business, such as lima beans, peas, potato starch, peppers and wholesale dry beans, among other items.  This means whe will have a wider variety of products so she can continue striving to reach her goal: "To have her own shop".

loans.use: To buy vegetables such as lima beans, peas, potato starch, peppers and maize leaf, as well as wholesale dry beans, etc.

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.ru: Кароматулло проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 22 года. Он холост. Кароматулло живет с родителями. Он работает таксистом, в основном он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе-Вахдат. Этот вид транспорта является недорогим для горожан. Кароматулло уже год как работает в этой области. Он берет кредит для ремонта маршрутки.
texts.en: Karomatullo lives in the town of Vahdat. He is not married. Karomatullo lives with his parents. He works as a taxi driver and mainly transports passengers on the route from Dushanbe to Vahdat. This type of transport is inexpensive for the residents. Karomatullo has been working in this field for a year. He is taking out the loan to repair the minibus.

loans.use: to repair the minibus.

loans.name: Islomjon

texts.ru: Исломчон проживает в городе Вахдат. Ему 23 года. Он женат. Исломчон живет с женой. Он хочет начать свою деятельность у себя дома. Исломчон берет кредит для закупа крупнорогатого скота. Он намерен заняться скотоводством. На сегодняшний день Исломчон не работает. Его родители помогают ему. Не смотря на это Исломчон хочет зарабатывать и обеспечивать свою семью сам.
texts.en: Islomjon lives in the town of Vahdat. He is 23 years old, married and lives with his wife. He wants to start his business at home. Islomjon is taking out the loan to buy large horned cattle. He plans to do animal husbandry. Right now Islomjon does not work anywhere. His parents are helping him out. Nevertheless, Islomjon wants to make money and provide for his family himself.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Mirna Maribel

texts.es: Mirna Maribel de treinta y dos años de edad vive junto a su hermana, ella posee un tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, bebidas, embutidos, entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy conocida en la zona por ser una buena comerciante y porque todo lo que vende es de calidad y a precios accesibles; Mirna es una mujer dedicada a su labor, siempre dispuesta a salir adelante quiere mantenerse al frente de su competencia y desea invertir en el negocio pero necesita de capital es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas embutidos etc. Mirna Maribel tiene capacidad de pago y buenas referencias crediticias, esta satisfecha con el apoyo brindado y es así como tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar el financiamiento con éxito y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una vida plena y completa como se la merecen.
texts.en:
Mirna Maribel, 32, lives with her sister and runs a store where she sells essential items such as basic grains, beverages, sausages and other products.  The store is located in her home and is very well-known because she is a good salesperson and sells quality products at low prices.  Mirna is very dedicated to her work and is always looking for ways to prosper.  She wants to stay ahead of the competition and invest in her business, but she is in need of capital.  Therefore she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL to buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, bread, beverages, sausages, etc.  

Mirna Maribel is able to make payments on her loan and has a good credit record.  She is happy to receive the support and is confident she can pay back the loan on time, while giving her family the more fulfilling life that they deserve.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, instant products, sweets, bread, beverages and sausages.

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es: Rafaela de cincuenta y cuatro años de edad  vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia, ella posee una venta de pupusas revueltas, de queso, chicharrón, entre otras, todo lo  elabora  exquisito, por eso se ha hecho de mucha clientela además la prefieren porque saben que todo está realizado con material de primera calidad, higiénico y lo vende a precios accesibles además Rafaela se caracteriza por su enorme amabilidad; es una mujer trabajadora, muy entregada a su hogar y a su labor, tiene un excelente don en la cocina y lo está aprovechando al máximo, cada día aumenta más la demanda porque los clientes están satisfechos, quiere aumentar la producción de pupusas pero no posee del suficiente capital para hacerlo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, queso, frijoles, chicharrón, verduras, etc. Rafaela tiene buenas referencias de pago y esta contenta con la ayuda es por eso asegura que se responsabilizara a cancelar todo el financiamiento y al mismo tiempo hará lo posible para que su familia tenga una vida plena.
texts.en:
Rafaela, 54, lives with her children in her own house.  She runs a food stall where she sells pupusas (stuffed tortillas), scrambled eggs, with cheese, pork rind, etc.  Her cooking is delicious and she has been able to attract many customers who like her food which is made with top quality ingredients, cooked in a clean environment and sold at low prices.  Rafaela is known for her extraordinary kindesss.  She is a hard worker and very dedicated to her household and job.  

She has a gift for cooking and takes full advantage of it.  The demand for her food increases every day because customers are very satisfied.  She wants to increase pupusa production but does not have sufficient capital to do so.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn, cheese, beans, pork rind, vegetables, etc.  Rafaela has a good credit record and is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.  At the same time, she wants to give her family a fulfilling lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, beans, pork rind and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tomatoes, chili, onions, avocados and plantains, among other things.

loans.name: Kuarahy Rese Group

texts.es:
Kuarahy rese  se denomina el  buen grupo de mujeres conformado 13 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya en el 7° ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa. Ella vieron una gran oportunidad para sus familias, y es por ello que decidieron unirse.
Una de estas mujeres luchadoras es Cinthia, quien es la presidenta, y cuenta que se dedica a la venta de zapatos de todo tipo, y es gracias a este trabajo que se esta abriendo camino.  Su deseo es poder sacar adelante a su familia por medio de su trabajo y es por eso que lucha día a día.
Solicita de esta crédito para la compra de calzados para damas y caballeros, y de esa forma poder tener una buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Kuarahy Rese is the name of this nice group, composed of thirteen women who enjoy working and are now in their seventh cycle together in the program. They saw the great opportunity it represented for their families, so they decided to join.

One of these striving women is Cinthia, who is the president. She says that she sells all kinds of shoes and that thanks to this job, she is getting ahead in life. Her dream is to be able to thrive with her family with the help of her job. This is why she works hard every day.

She is requesting a credit to buy shoes for women and for men, in order to be able to offer a wider variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy shoes for women and for men.

loans.name: Houssam

texts.en:
Houssam is a 38 year old married, Lebanese man. He lives with his wife and two children at their modest house located in one of the beautiful villages of Lebanon. His children are still attending school. 

Houssam has spent many years solving home electricity problems. He works independently on a free-lance basis. He has always wanted to expand his business and improve his work. At the moment, however, he earns quite a basic income; this is why he decided to take out a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase new tools and supplies for his electrical business. 

He confirms that the loan will help him take on bigger projects and thus increase his income by 15%. And, as Houssam works independently, he wishes to have his own electrical equipment shop as soon as possible, in order to keep on responding to his client’s problems and therefore cover his family's needs.

loans.use: to purchase new tools and supplies for his electrical repair business

loans.name: Ibrohim

texts.ru: Иброхим житель города Турсунзаде. Ему 41 год. Иброхим женат. Он отец троих детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Иброхим на протяжении двенадцати лет зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Он очень хороший и трудолюбивый человек. Иброхим хочет увеличить поголовья скота и расширить свою деятельность. Он берет кредит для закупа бычков, чтобы весной вывести скот на рынок.
texts.en:
Ibrohim is a 41-year-old married man living in Tursun-zoda. He has three children and his wife is a homemaker. 

Ibrohim has earned a living breeding cattle for the past twelve years. He is a good, hardworking person, and he would like to obtain additional heads of cattle and expand his business. He is requesting this loan to purchase bulls so that he can take cattle to the market in the spring.

loans.use: to purchase bulls.

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es:
Juan tiene 36 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos, uno de 16 años que estudia noveno grado, una niña de 12 años que estudia quinto grado y el menor de la familia de seis años de edad. La esposa de Juan se dedica a elaborar y vender comida típica, pasteles, enchiladas, tostadas, etc.

Él tiene 8 años de experiencia en el negocio de venta de sorbetes (helados). Trabajo seis años para una empresa y dos años trabajo de forma independiente. Actualmente trabaja en la venta de tamales, pan dulce, pan francés y realiza viajes a diferentes partes del país, hace poco empezó como repartidor de periódicos. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando es para comprar sorbetes, un termo y un frizer, para mantener sus helados, además comprara conos, vasos, servilletas, cucharas desgartables, crispi, maní, para iniciar nuevamente el negocio de los helados. Don Juan conoce muy bien este negocio y sabe que le deja buenas ganancias para tener una estabilidad económica para su familia; su deseo es adquirir una plancha para elaborar pupusas.
texts.en:
Juan is 36 years old. He is married with three children, a 16 year old in the 9th grade, a 12 year old girl in the 5th grade, and the youngest member of the family is six years old. Juan's wife works selling traditional food such as pastries, enchiladas, tostadas (toasted tortillas), etc.

Juan has 8 years of experience in the business of selling ice creams. For six years he worked for a company, and for 2 years he was self-employed. Currently he works selling tamales, sweet breads, and "french bread", and travels to different parts of the country. Not long ago he started delivering newspapers.

He is asking for this loan so that he can buy ice cream, and a cooler and freezer to store his ice creams. He will also buy cones, glasses, serviettes, disposable spoons, cereal topping and peanuts so that he can restart his ice cream business. Don Juan knows this business very well and knows that it allows him to make a good income and provide economic security for his family. His wish is to get a griddle so he can make pupusas (corn tortillas).

loans.use: to buy ingredients, materials and equipment to restart his ice cream business.

loans.name: Abdallah

texts.en:
Abdallah is a brave man. He’s 39 years old and married to an adorable and lovely woman. They have two school-aged children and are ready to sacrifice their lives for them. 

Abdallah provides the main source of income for his family. He has huge responsibilities to manage, especially paying his children’s educational fees. 

In 2000, Abdallah started to work with his own van. His job consists of transporting students to and from places upon request. And because Abdallah is facing some problems with his van, he has requested a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to perform the necessary maintenance on it. 

This is how he strives to develop his business better. He really wants to expand his work and buy a bigger van to transport a wider range of clients.

loans.use: to perform the necessary maintenance on his van

loans.name: Selevano

texts.en:
Selevano is a 32-year-old, hardworking, married man with three children living in Fort Portal ,Uganda. 

For 11 years, he has been operating a salon. He also has a motorcycle, which he hires out and receives 80% of the daily earnings. In addition, he runs a hotel and sells phone accessories. 

Like most responsible fathers, he has a personal goal of educating his children through to University. He has the hardships of high labor turnover, poor roads that cause consistent breakdowns and price fluctuations to contend with. 

His dream is to diversify into farming and expand to new markets. Selevano is requesting a loan to buy land for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Guapa nace mediante el apoyo de otro comité que se encontraba trabajando cerca de la casa de las miembros. Ellas son mujeres jefas de familia que siguen sus sueños, y es por ello que se unieron, pues desean salir adelante.
Marlene forma parte del grupo, ella vende comestibles de todo tipo, tiene muy buena clientela, ya que sus comidas son ricas y eso hace que tenga mucha venta. Hace un tiempo que se dedica a esto y le gusta mucho, pues es un trabajo digno y honesto. Quiere seguir haciéndolo, y es por eso que solicita el crédito, para la compra de insumos para sus comidas, como ser carne, discos de empanada, harina, huevo, condimentos y demás.
texts.en:
The Kuña Guapa committee was born with the support of another committee that was working close by the house of one of the members. They are women who are heads of household who are following their dreams. That is why they have united, because they want to get ahead.

Marlene is a part of the group. She sells all kinds of food. She has a good clientele because her food is delicious and that makes her have good sales. She has done this for some time, and she likes it because it is honest and dignified work. She wants to keep doing it and that is why she has asked for a loan to buy materials for her foods, such as meat, disks to make empanadas, flour, condiments and more.

loans.use: to buy disks to make empanadas, flour, eggs, condiments and more.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 34 years old and from a small village in the Samtredia district of West Georgia. He lives with his wife, two children (16 and 14 years old) and grandmother, who is provided with a retirement pension. 

The family runs an agricultural business. Specifically, they have a milk cow and a calf, whose milk is used in cheese production. He owns a hectare of land, where maize and nut trees are grown. In addition, George has a greenhouse, where he sows greens and tomatoes. 

George sells cheese, maize, nuts, greens and tomatoes locally in an open market. Besides this, George has a poultry raising business. He hatches chickens three times a year, 2000 each time and sells regularly in his village. He works hard to ensure a good harvest and has rich experience in this business. 

George requested a loan to purchase a greenhouse polyethylene cover and fertilizers for the greens and tomatoes. After the greenhouse is covered properly, it will keep the correct temperature and after fertilizing the greens and tomatoes the family will be able to harvest and sell more products. 

This will significantly increase the family’s income and improve their living conditions. George awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a greenhouse polyethylene cover and fertilizers for the greens and tomatoes

loans.name: Shoira

texts.ru: Шоира занимается куплей  продажей женской  и детской одежды на  рынке своего  района.  Товар покупает из города Истаравшана и из Кайракума.  А привезенный товар продается на местном рынке.   Ей 34 года. Она замужем, имеет троих детей которые  помогают матери.  Её муж   работает в  Российской Федерации, но с доходом заработанной   из России не может обеспечить семью и поэтому Шоире приходится  работать и содержать семью самой. Шоира старается  чтобы ее дети росли в хороших условиях  и  мечтает дать им хорошее  образование.  На полученный кредит Шоира хочет закупить детскую и женскую одежду  для расширение своего товарооборота. Благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Shoira sells women's and children's clothing at the market in her neighborhood. She purchases clothing from the cities of Istarawshan and Kairakkum and then sells them at the local market. 

Shoira is a 34-year-old married woman with three children, who help her with her business. Her husband works in the Russian Federation, but he does not earn enough money to support the family. Hence, Shoira has to work to support the family herself. She tries to ensure that her children are raised in good conditions and she dreams of providing them with a good education. 

Shoira would like this loan to purchase children's and women's clothing in order to expand her product selection. She sincerely thanks Arvand for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase of children's and women's clothing

loans.name: Priscilana

texts.es:
La Señora Prisciliana tiene 59 años, es soltera, vive en la Ciudad de Itá, tiene 4 hijos, tiene una pequeña carpintería donde fabrica todo tipo de materiales como ser porta vasos, porta CD, porta platos, mazos, tabla de picar carne, espátula de madera entre otros, además se dedica a la venta de ajos, es una señora muy trabajadora y sacrificada, que día a día se esfuerza para progresar y salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de madera de primera para su carpintería y de esa forma poder seguir haciendo todos los materiales que hace. Agradece por la oportunidad de crecimiento y progreso que recibe.
texts.en:
Prisciliana is 59 years old. She is single and lives in the city of Itá. She is the mother of 4 children. She has a small carpentry shop where she makes all kind of items such as trays, CD racks, mallets, cutting boards, wooden spatulas and more. She also sells garlic. She is a very hardworking and dedicated woman who strives day to day to progress and get ahead.

She is asking for this loan to buy high quality wood for her carpentry and in this way be able to keep making all of the items she makes. She is grateful for the opportunity for growth and progress that she is receiving.

loans.use: to buy wood for carpentry.

loans.name: Rosa Natalia

texts.es:
La señora Rosa tiene 28 años, está en pareja con el señor David, tienen una hija de 4 años, viven en la ciudad de Itá, desciende de una familia de artesanos, pues su madre es reconocida en el país y a nivel internacional por su don de artesana en barro.
La señora Rosa heredó dicha profesión de su madre, desde los 9 años de edad se dedica a esta actividad, produce diversas figuras en barro como por ejemplo palomitas, mujer paraguaya, sapo de orquesta, pesebres y otros, los cuales vende en el país y exporta al extranjero.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de arena ya que se acerca fin de año y desea prepararse para producir pesebres de diferentes tamaños y diseños. Ella demuestra ser una persona muy emprendedora y con ganas de salir adelante, es muy sacrificada y talentosa en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Rosa is 28 years old. Her spouse is David and they have a 4 year old daughter. They live in the city of Itá. She comes from a family of artisans. Her mother is well known in the country and internationally for her gifts as an artisanal clay worker.

Rosa inherited the profession from her mother and has worked in this activity since she was 9 years old. She makes different figurines from clay such as doves, Paraguayan women, orquestra toads, mangers and more. She sells them in the country and exports them. 

She is asking for the loan to buy sand because the end of the year is coming and she wants to get ready to produce mangers in different sizes and designs. She has shown herself to be a very enterprising person who wants to get ahead. She is very hardworking and talented at her job.

loans.use: to buy flour to make figurines.

loans.name: Mujeres De Azcurra Group

texts.es:
Las 14 integrantes del grupo cuentan con actividades variadas, pero también hacen actividades juntas para poder tener un pequeño ahorro para algún imprevisto que pueda surgir.
Rosa, una de estas mujeres se dedica a la venta de verduras en forma ambulante, nos dice que es un trabajo sacrificado y agotador, pero que es su medio de vida, y con el cual ayuda a su familia y les da todo lo que necesitan. Rosa es muy trabajadora, emprendedora y por sobre todo muy positiva y con ansias de salir adelante.
Solicita de este crédito para la compra de verduras, con las que quiere surtirse y seguir teniendo productos de primera que ofrecer a sus clientes. todas agradecen por la ayuda que reciben, pues les será muy útil.
texts.en:
The 14 members of the group all rely on various activities, but they also also do activities together so that they can save a little for any unforeseen circumstances that might come up.

Rosa, one of these women, works selling vegetables on a street stall. She tells us that it is hard and exhausting work, but that it is her way of life, and with it she can help her family and give them everything they need. Rosa is a very hard-working and enterprising woman, and above all she is very positive and anxious to move forward.

She is asking for this loan to buy vegetables so that she can stock up and continue to have first-class products to offer her customers. The group members are all grateful for the help they get, as it will be very useful to them.

loans.use: buy vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Salimjon

texts.ru: Салимжон мужчина в возрасте  38 лет, женат, имеет 3-их детей. Салимжон занимается куплей  продажи скота. Он дома  откармливает   крупно рогатый скот.   Салимжон начал свой бизнес с маленького оборота, и год за годом он расширял  свой бизнес.  Его жена домохозяйка, она занимается воспитанием детей и старается  помогать мужу .  Салимжон получает хорошую прибыль  от купле продажи скота так как знает все преимущества этого бизнеса. Он планирует еще больше расширить свой бизнес так как у него трое детей и их надо вырастить и обучить в хороших учебных заведениях. На полученный кредит Салимжон хочет приобрести несколько голов скота и увеличить их поголовье. Заранее благодарен за финансовою поддержку.
texts.en:
Salimjon is a 38-year-old married man with three children. He trades cattle, which he fattens from his home. He started his business from a small sum of money and year after year he has expanded. His wife is a homemaker, who raises the children and tries to help her husband. 

As Salijmon knows the ins and outs of the business, cattle trade provides him with a good income. Though, he still plans to expand his business because he has three children to raise and educate. He would like this loan to purchase a few additional heads of cattle to increase his overall count. He thanks you in advance for the financial support!

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a 45-year-old married man from Lebanon. He is living with his wife and four children. They are all attending school. In 1992, to supplement the family’s income, he decided to start his own work as a farmer. His job consists of cultivating seasonal fruits and vegetables. He takes a good care of his land and wishes to grow as much as possible in his field. Today, he is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase agricultural tools and supplies, seeds, fertilizer, plastic tents and many other items. He states that the loan will certainly help him increase his business productivity by a fair percentage, which will return on him with greater harvests and thus greater profits. In the future, he plans to take more Kiva loans and expand his lands with a wider variety of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural tools and supplies, seeds, fertilizer, plastic tents and many other items.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en: Amer is a 32-year-old engaged man from Lebanon. He lives with his parents and two siblings. One of them is working and the other attending school. His father is the main income source of the family. In order to help him, Amer opened a shop in 2006 where he serves hubble-bubble, a Lebanese traditional tobacco. He distributes to a wide range of clients in his village and its neighborhoods. Today, he is requesting a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase tobacco and hubble-bubble equipment. In the future, he plans to borrow another Kiva loan and make the needed savings for his wedding. He wishes to have his own family and children; this is why he’s working nonstop to better develop his business.

loans.use: to purchase tobacco and hubble-bubble equipment

loans.name: Houssam

texts.en: Houssam is a Lebanese married man. He’s 35 years old. He’s really attached to his family, which is composed of his wife and three children, all of whom school. Cooperating together, Houssam and his wife have been able to cover their heavy life expenses in order to live a respectable life. Houssam started to work in his trade at an early age. He strives to work with high professionalism to be able to support his family. He started his own business in 2010. He has been working as a car mechanic in his own garage and has gained a fair number of customers asking for his services, especially since he has many years of experience in the same occupation. Today, he’s asking for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to buy new mechanic's tools in order to respond rapidly and properly to his clients’ problems. He believes that acting properly is really essential to attract more and added customers. In the future, he plans to enlarge his business and hire people to work with him.

loans.use: to buy new mechanic's tools.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 26-year-old single man living with his parents and three working siblings. He has four years of experience working with mobile phones. He owns a store in his town where his clients visit him from all the neighboring villages. He sells diverse trademark mobile phones in addition to related accessories. With his requested youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l, he will be able to increase his selection of new mobile phones, accessories and other items. He reports that both his income and business sales will increase as a result of the loan. In the future, he is looking to further expand his business and increase its capital.

loans.use: to increase his selection of new mobile phones, accessories and other items.

loans.name: Raed

texts.en: Raed is a friendly and kind young man. He’s 24 years old. He’s single, living with his parents and one working sibling. A few years ago, Raed started to manage the family expenses supporting his father. And since he noticed that his income did not satisfy their needs, he decided to launch a clothing business with the small amount of money he already had. He sells a wide variety of men's clothes, from which he earns a fair amount of money daily. To better develop his work, he’s requesting a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. He will use the loan to buy more merchandise for his business, such as pants, t-shirts and other items. This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products and thus improve his income. Raed wishes to open other branches as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for his business, such as pants, t-shirts and other items.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
Claudio forma parte del Banco Comunal “Mis Sueños” perteneciente a la ciudad de Talca.
El se dedica al rubro de venta de leña, desde hace 10 años. Comenta que trabaja fuera de su casa, y en estos momentos se encuentra recolectando madera para vender en la temporada de invierno y el mes fuerte de venta es Marzo hasta Septiembre. Sale en busca de leña a cordilleras y bosques, algunas veces compra la madera y la vende a su clientela.
Su mercadería la compra algunas veces en distribuidoras de madera y otras veces sale a buscar a los bosques, campos y cordilleras.
Con el crédito comprará bencina, cadenas, Aceites y una motosierra.
Una de las metas de Claudio es vender mucho más que el año pasado, por eso se encuentra en recolección de madera, y cortando para la venta de ésta, para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Claudio vive junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 20 y 4 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel laboral es vender lo que mas pueda y a nivel familiar ver que sus hijos tengan un buen futuro y darles un buen pasar.
El se encuentra muy contento y agradecido de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. 
Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
Claudio is part of the Mis Sueños (My Dreams) communal bank in the city of Talca.  For ten years he has made a living in the area of selling firewood.  He says that he works outside of his home and in these moments he can be found gathering wood to sell in the winter season; the months with the strongest sales are March through September.  He goes out in search of firewood in the mountains and woods, and sometimes buys the wood to sell to his customers.  He sometimes buys his merchandise from wood distributers and other times he goes out to find it in the woods, countryside, and mountains. 

With the loan he will buy gasoline, chains, oil, and a power saw.  One of Claudio's goals is to sell much more than last year, which is why he can be found gathering wood and chopping it to sell and to generate higher income so with this he can aim for a better quality of life. 

Claudio lives together with his wife and two children of 4 and 20 years old.  His dream for work is to sell as much as he can and his dream for his family is to see that his children have a good future and to give them a good life.  He is very happy and grateful for the opportunity offered by Fondo Esperanza because it will allow him to invest in his business.  In regards to the communal bank group that he is a part of, he says that very good communication exists within it.  On the other hand, the training has helped him to learn new sales and accounting strategies.  

Talca belongs to the region of Maule, located in the center area of the country.  This is the administrative, economic, and cultural center of the region, being the most important city of the Chilean Central Valley.  There is a curious reference to Talca that exists in Chile: the phrase "Talca, Paris, and London."  Among the myths on this matter some say that this is a derivation of what was originally said by an Englishman, "Talca looks like London," for the abundant fog that frequently covers the city during the winter season, similar to the capital of the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy gasoline, chains, oil, and a power saw.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en: Allen lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children, and all her children go to school. She has one additional family member (her grandmother). She operates a retail shop that she rents. She also gets additional income from farming .She has been in this business for the last 5 years. She works seven days a week. She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy more bags of sugar, cooking oil, flour, rice, soap, beans, wheat and crates of soda. Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goal is to buy a truck for transporting her stock to the shop. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap, cooking oil, flour, rice, beans, wheat and crates of soda.

loans.name: Rafi

texts.en: Rafi is a 47-year-old Lebanese man. He’s married to a kind lady, the mother of his three school-aged children. With the cooperation of his working wife, Rafi has been able to manage the family’s household expenses and thus improve their way of living. He has many years of experience as a car mechanic, and he decided to open his own garage in 1991. As he wishes to better develop his work, Rafi is asking today for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase a good quantity of spare car parts at fair prices. This step will enhance his business, allowing him to receive more clients who are going to be served rapidly. Rafi and his family depend on this career, and that’s why another Kiva loan will be way good for him to expand his business and increase his earnings.

loans.use: to purchase a good quantity of spare car parts at fair prices.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with five children, and all her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a retail shop that she rents. She also gets additional income from selling fruits and vegetables at the market .She has been in this business for the last 5 years. She works seven days a week.  She has requested a loan of 1,000,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy cooking oil, flour, rice, soap and crates of soda. Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are  to educate her children to university level and expand her retail shop into a wholesale shop. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil, flour, rice, soap and crates of soda.

loans.name: Bassam

texts.en: Bassam is a 39-year-old man. He’s married and lives in Lebanon with his wife and three children. They are all studying. He is the one responsible for covering his family expenses and responding to their needs. He also has his wife’s support; she works at one of the local Lebanese hospitals. Bassam is obliged to work continually, for he wants to enhance his family’s way of life. He has been working in the construction field since 1990. His specialty is floor covering, and he has gained a fair number of clients asking for his services. Though satisfied with what he has attained so far, he suffers from a bad financial situation; that’s the reason of why he’s asking today for a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to improve his business by allowing him to purchase new construction tools, for he wants to continue offering the best quality of work for his clients. In the near future, Bassam plans to take more loans to open his own paving shop. This is how he works really hard to achieve his goals.

loans.use: to improve his business by purchasing new construction tools.

loans.name: Clovis

texts.en: Clovis is a forty-two-year-old married man with five children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. For ten years now he has been actively involved in commercial agriculture, and he got his initial capital from carpentry. Just like most farmers he is faced with challenges of unpredictable weather changes and price fluctuation; however, he has dreams of venturing into modern farming activities and having a wholesale shop. Clovis intends to use the loan to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Porfirio

texts.es:
Don Porfirio tiene 52 años, vive en pareja con Vicenta  y tienen 3 hijos. Es comerciante desde hace mas de 20 años, realiza sus ventas en forma directa y también en forma de pedidos como macatero (vendedor ambulante) en las zonas de la Cordillera, Caaguazú, y Encarnación, cuenta con clientela formada a quienes visita en forma permanente dependiendo de la zona que le toque trabajar.
Cuenta que con los préstamos que obtuvo de la Fundación Paraguaya llego a ampliar la variedad de sus productos, satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, y aumentar sus ingresos, que gracias a eso asume con todos los gastos familiares y la educación de sus hijos.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de artículos de pesca, herramientas para carpintería, los cuales tienen mucha salida a la hora de vender.
texts.en:
Don Porfirio is 52 years old, he lives in partnership with Vicenta and they have three children.  He has been a merchant for more than 20 years.  He makes his sales directly and also from orders as a street vendor in the areas of Cordillera, Caaguazú, and Encarnación.  He has formed customers whom he visits regularly depending on the area that he works.

He says that with the loans he has gotten from Fundación Paraguaya he has come to increase the variety of his products, satisfying his customers' demand and increasing his income, which thanks to this he assumes all of the family expenses and the education of his children.  He asks for the loan to buy fishing items and carpentry tools, which have great marketability when it is time to sell.

loans.use: to buy fishing items, carpentry tools, etc.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
This is Ahmad, a 32-year-old Lebanese married man. He lives with his wife and their one child. He had many years of experience as a barber until he decided to open his own shop in 2003. He intended to open the shop in his town as he knows its entire population and most of them are really close to him. Ahmad always seeks to please his clients and responds to their needs, whatever they are.

He also owns a van in which he transports people to their desired locations. Today, he’s asking for a loan from Kiva Partner Ameen s.a.l to renovate his shop’s interior decorations. He notes that this Kiva loan will better improve his work, allowing him attract added customers and thus increase his revenues by 20%. Ahmad is not ready to have a big family until he’s financially satisfied and able to cover all their needs. This is why he’s trying his best to develop his work and enlarge his business as soon as possible.

loans.use: to renovate his shop’s interior decorations.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 25-year-old Lebanese young man. He’s single and living with two of his relatives, because his father’s business is outside the country. Hasan wants to cover their expenses, although he gets a fair monthly amount from his father.  Because of that, he’s working really hard to be able to reach his goals. 

He started his own business as a private teacher in 2009. He receives his students at home, because in that way he will be able to deliver his lessons in a good way. 

Today, he’s requesting to borrow a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase needed teaching materials in addition to stationery and many other items. Hasan is sure that this will allow him to develop his way of teaching and thus his communication with the students. Joining a school is one of his greatest dreams, where he can improve his skills and therefore his way of living.

loans.use: to purchase the needed teaching materials in addition to stationery and many other items.

loans.name: Zapha

texts.en: Zapha lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with two children, and both of her children go to school. She has additional family members (mother, sister, brother and father). She operates a retail shop that she rents. She also gets additional income from selling new clothes, jewelry and crafts. She has been in business for the last 7 years. She works seven days a week.  She has requested a loan of 1,500,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of sugar, cooking oil, soap, beans, wheat and crates of soda. Her major business challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are to buy a truck for transporting her stock to the shop, to own a wholesale shop, and to build her own business premises. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy more bags of sugar, cartons of salt, boxes of soap, wheat and crates of soda

loans.name: Zahra

texts.en:
Zahra is a 44-year-old Lebanese married woman. She lives with her husband. They cooperate together expecting to bring added income to the family.  She has worked from home as a private teacher since 2007. She also teaches at a local school. As for her husband, he has his own business and works independently. 

Zahra feels that she is helping learners to get their needed education. So she asked today to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to arrange a special room in her house where she receives her students and equip it with required materials and supplies. She notes that these purchases will facilitate her work preparation and will help her do research and studies which will improve her teaching skills. She is very positive about her future and wishes to receive more students with the coming school season.

loans.use: to arrange a special room in her house where she receives her students and equip it with required materials and supplies.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a married man living with his wife and one child. He’s a 25-year-old hard worker looking to respond to his family demands and satisfy their needs. Ali has many years of experience in his present job. He’s an independent painter who works on clients' requests. He works on different projects and always tries to offer his customers the best results. He also works on his van in his free time. He’s known for being well-organized and punctual. 

Today, he’s asking for a youth loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase new painting tools and supplies. He will be utilizing the painting in his new projects. He’s grateful for all the good things god has given him. In the near future, he looks to take on more projects, maybe outside the country, and therefore earn superior income.

loans.use: to purchase new painting tools and supplies.

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 43-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and three children, who are all attending school. With his family’s support, Ibrahim is capable of managing the house expenses and live a proper life.  Despite all the difficulties that he faced, he was courageous and not afraid to take on his  whole family's responsibilities. 

He started to work as a painter in year 2000 and still works on a free-lance basis. He’s expert in his field and knows very well how to deal with his clients. Today, he’s requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l. to purchase added painting tools for his business in order to be able to handle his new project. This Kiva loan will open a new door for him to take bigger projects and increase his productivity by 30%. In the future, he plans to open his own painting shop.

loans.use: to purchase added painting tools for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase his stock of household goods.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 32 years old, and he owns Angelica Fashions. He successfully repaid his previous loan because his business did very well. He is a very hardworking man, as he has to provide for his family and also provide quality services for his customers.

He requires another loan of 53,156 to buy cloth, thread and buttons. He wishes to expand his business more and increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, buttons and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Bernard used his previous loan to add stock of sugar, cooking fat, soda, soap and rice. His business did well and he repaid his loan. Since he joined Faulu Kenya he has become very successful and his business has grown.
 
He dreams of having a big business and increasing his profits. He requests a loan of 90,000 KES to increase his grocery stock.

loans.use: To add stock of sugar, cooking fat, soda, soap and rice.

loans.name: Mbalu

texts.en:
Mbalu is 47 years old, widowed, and has three children. She runs a local food business in Kandeh town Bo, Southern area in Sierra Leone, which she has been doing for nine years. She began this business after the death of her husband.   Mbalu sells gari (a couscous-like grain made from grated cassava).  Her business is the only income she has. 

Mbalu is requesting a loan from BRAC Sierra Leone, which she will use to buy more bags of gari to sell. The main challenges to her business are competition in the market and the cost of transportation which is very high.The extra income from this loan will help her increase her business and educate her children. In the future, Mbalu would like to open a gari store.

loans.use: to purchase bags of gari to sell.

loans.name: Agress

texts.en: Agress lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children, and one of her children goes to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a retail shop that she rents. She also has a motorcycle to generate additional income. She has been in business for the last 5 years. She works seven days a week.
